COMMENT_TX: ej,duncm001,P,davig901,Fighting with Brad Ausmus ej,ausmb001,P,davig901,Fighting with Mariano Duncan ej,incap001,P,davig901,Brawl ej,judej001,P,davig901,Brawl $Mariano Duncan had been HBP in the second; the first pitch to him in the fourth knocked him down; Duncan started to walk to the mound but was blocked by catcher Brad Ausmus; Duncan pushed Ausmus and both benches emptied; ejected by HP umpire Gerry Davis: Ausmus, Duncan, Jeff Juden and Pete Incaviglia
